items.text: It is possible that the JSONObject parser has been made more lenient in newer Android releases.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: The error message you are getting appears to be due to dubiously-legal JSON, particularly on the receiving side:
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: I would suggest that you write your downloaded JSON out to a file and compare it with your original to see if there is a problem with the download logic.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: Usually these are the following steps to create json object through the Http connection in android.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: open the connection and get the response.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: get the content and create a string builder.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: make the string builder into json array object (this step you have not done)
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: get json object from the json array object.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: I think you missed to convert String Buffer(sb) into json array object.
items.href: JSON Parsing works on Android 4.0 but not on Android < 4.0 - Stack Overflow

items.text: Instead of that you directly create the json object from string buffer.
